Refer to the exhibit. A software engineer needs to collect data about devices that are registered in Cisco DNA Center using the API. Before collecting the data, the engineer must obtain a token and authenticate with the API. To automate the procedure, a Python script is used. Which code snippet must be placed onto the blank in the code?

discussion.content:

C is correct

questions.question_text:
A developer needs to create an application with these requirements:
• decouples from the underlying infrastructure
• runs application on any cloud or on-premises provider

Which deployment type must be used for this application?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer develops an Ansible playbook to perform tasks that automate the provisioning of a server. What occurs on the server after the playbook is run?

choices.B: The Vim, Git, and Pip packages are backed up.
choices.A: The Vim, Git, and Pip packages are removed.
choices.C: Only the Vim package is installed as the most recent package.
choices.D: The most relevant versions of the Vim, Git, and Pip packages are installed.

questions.question_text: Which network component enables communication between broadcast domains?

choices.B: Implement infrastructure components using a single platform.
choices.A: Apply configuration changes across devices using the same model.
choices.D: Configure the infrastructure using a multi-interface API.
choices.C: Collect logging information using a single model across the infrastructure.

questions.question_text: What type of efficiency is achieved by using model-driven programmability for infrastructure automation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct
